mapper.select: SELECT A.RNUM, E.EMP_NAME, A.APNTM_DVSN_NUM, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME, A.START_DATE, AP.APRVL_STS FROM ( SELECT APNTM_NUM, APNTM_DVSN_NUM, EMP_NUM, DEPT_NUM, RANK_NUM, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , APRVL_NUM, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY APNTM_NUM DESC) AS RNUM FROM APNTM )A INNER JOIN EMP E ON A.EMP_NUM = E.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN DEPT D ON A.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM INNER JOIN RANK R ON A.RANK_NUM = R.RANK_NUM LEFT OUTER JOIN APRVL_LINE AP ON A.APRVL_NUM = AP.APRVL_NUM
